name: Chinese Brush Simulator
description:
Chinese brushes used to be the most important tools for writing and drawing in China, but the time has passed, now they disappeared from the daily life of most Chinese. And many other tools in study are gone with Chinese brushes too. The developer of this game is a fanatic of hardcore simulation game, and with the creed of "Everything Can be Simulated", the developer try to combine the Chinese brushes with computer simulation.

Feature:

★Take a glance at the great culture of Chinese brushes, a simple simulator for showing the way of writing and drawing in ancient China.

★Simulate the shape of the Chinese brush when moving on the surface of paper, it feels soft and elastic.

★Simulate the water spreading on paper and dry drawing with sticky ink. Control the ratio of water and ink to achieve different effect.

★When you finished the drawing, you can hang it on the wall of the study.

★You can use a picture as background or the copy source of the drawing.

Suitable for:

★Players who interest in Chinese brush，Chinese culture experiencer ，enthusiast for simulation game, game collector，master of mouse operation, etc.

Unsuitable for:

★Players with low computer hardware configuration, players who are not used to mouse operation.

Attention:

There are still many differences between simulated brush and real brush, if you want to seek the true path of the Chinese brush, please use the real bush.

The game is still in development，some functions for Steam are not available by now. If you have any advice or bug report, please contact with the developer (see "Early Access").
